display_name: During the last 14 days, number of days the child had to use albuterol (brand names Pro-Air, Proventil, Ventolin, Xopenex) by puffer or breathing machine/nebulizer during the day for relief of asthma symptoms (excluding albuterol/salbu)
description:
Item from Composite Asthma Severity Index (CASI) daytime asthma symptom assessment. [Wildfire JJ, Gergen PJ, Sorkness CA, et al. 2012 (PubMed ID: 22244599)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22244599/)

[Search for all CASI variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=casi)
